**Solution**

$[\vec{x}^*\vec{\hat\beta} - 1.96\, \SE_{\mathrm{pred}}, \vect{x}^*\vec{\hat\beta} + 1.96\, \SE_{\mathrm{pred}}]$, where $\SE_{\mathrm{pred}} = s\sqrt{1 +\vect{x^*}(\mathbb{X}^T\mat{X})^{-1}\vect{x^{*T}}}$. $\vect{x^*}$ is the new observed value and $\mat{X}$ is the design matrix. s is an approximation of $\sigma$, the standard deviation of the errors.
